title: Getting Started with LOON
author: The LOON Team
excerpt: Learn how to set up your own serverless micro-CMS with Project LOON - no database required, completely free to host.
body:
Welcome to Project LOON!

LOON (Lightweight Online Organizing Network) is a serverless micro-CMS that runs entirely on Cloudflare Pages and GitHub.

Key Benefits:
• Zero hosting costs - runs on free tiers
• No database to maintain
• Full version control with Git
• Edit from any device
• Simple, clean interface

To get started, check out the documentation at the project repository.
